table.name: custom_forms_views
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `custom_forms_views` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `module` varchar(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `custom_name` varchar(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `status` varchar(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`));

table.name: custom_forms_views_blocks
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `custom_forms_views_blocks` ( `customid` int(11) NOT NULL , `blockid` int(11) NOT NULL , `sequence` int(11) NULL , `always_show` int(3) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`customid`, `blockid`));

table.name: custom_forms_views_fields
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `custom_forms_views_fields` ( `customid` int(11) NOT NULL , `blockid` int(11) NOT NULL , `fieldid` int(11) NOT NULL , `sequence` int(11) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`customid`, `blockid`, `fieldid`));

table.sql: ALTER TABLE `custom_forms_views` ADD COLUMN `profiles` varchar(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL;

table.name: vte_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_modules` ( `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL , `valid` int(1) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`module`));
